description.jp:
ある時からクラウドをつけ狙い始めた
三兄弟のリーダー的存在で 「双刃」
と呼ばれる二枚刃の剣を操る。
冷静で凶暴 幼稚で知的と
感情が目まぐるしく変化する人物。
ジェノバに強いこだわりを持っており
セフィロスとも因縁が深い。

jp.text: 治してあげるよ\nそして母さんのところへ行こう！
家族で力を合わせて\n星に仕返しするんだ！
僕 やっと母さんに会えたんだ！
僕のリユニオン 見せてあげるよ

desc.en: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

desc.gl: Expends BRV to deal HP damage

desc.en:
Increases own BRV by 10% MAX BRV
3-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Deals split HP damage between all targets
All targets: 2 turns 1 level [Obsession] (limit 5)
Self: 3 turns [Unconscious Sentience]

[Obsession] level resets to 1 if not targetted by inflictor

Triggers [Eclipse] on targets afflicted with [Obsession V] after HP attacks (once per turn, excluding certain HP attacks)
• 4-HIT melee BRV + HP attack (50x4)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Increases own BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt 

[Obsession]
• Obsession I: steals 50% gained BRV
• Obsession II: lowers Defense by 20%
• Obsession III: lowers Attack by 20%
• Obsession IV: lowers Physical Defense by 20%
• Obsession V: inflictor triggers [Eclipse] after HP attacks
• Cumulative effect, level resets to 1 if not targetted by inflictor

[Unconscious Sentience]
• Raises Max BRV by 40%, Attack by 40%, Initial BRV by 30%
• Restores BRV by 40% Initial BRV
desc.jp:
自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
＋3HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
与えるHPダメージは分配
対象に2ACTION「執着」1段階付与（上限5）
自身に3ACTION「内に眠る思念」付与

「執着」は付与者の行動時　ターゲットにされないと段階が1段階に戻る

「執着」5段階が付与されている敵をターゲットとして自身がHP攻撃後
以下の「星蝕」がターゲットに追加発動
（一部HP攻撃を除く 追加発動は1回の行動で1回のみ）
・4HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・与えたHPダメージの30％分 自身のBRVをアップさせる
執着I：BRV回復を奪われる
内に眠る思念：初期BRV 最大BRV 攻撃力が上昇し BRVを一定量回復する

desc.en:
Reduces all targets' BRV to 0 (excluding enemies afflicted with BREAK)
3-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + AoE HP attack delivered twice (40x3x2)
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Target: 3 turns [Stigma], 2 turns 1 level [Obsession] (limit 5)

While afflicted with [Stigma], inflictor's debuffs becomes gilded and cannot be removed

[Obsession] level resets to 1 if not targetted by inflictor

Triggers [Eclipse] on targets afflicted with [Obsession V] after HP attacks (once per turn, excluding certain HP attacks)
• 4-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (50x4)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Increases own BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt 

[Stigma] 
• Steals BRV by 10% of Max BRV
• Lowers Attack by 20%
• Increases BRV damage taken by 20%

desc.en:
3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered thrice
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV 　
Target: 4 turns levels [Obsession] (limit 5)
Self: 6 turns Special Effect [Mother's Coffin]

[Obsession] level resets to 1 if not targetted by inflictor

Triggers [Eclipse] on targets afflicted with [Obsession V] after HP attacks (once per turn, excluding certain HP attacks)
• 4-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (50x4)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Increases own BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt 

[Mother's Coffin] 
• Raises Attack by 20/30/40/50/60%
• Increases stolen BRV overflow limit by 20/25/30/35/40%
• Increases own BRV by 20/25/30/35/40% HP damage dealt (once per turn)
* Effects varies based on target's [Obsession] level
